info.name: Warframe Fandom Sidebar Removal
info.description: Removes the wiki sidebar to allow more space for article content. Dark styling shown in the screenshot is from my Warframe Fandom Wiki Dark style.
info.additionalInfo: If you don't care for the list of Recent Wiki Activity and Popular Pages then this tiny style will reclaim that space, letting you focus on and better display the article content. (Requested by a friend)
